pullRequest.title: (#3319) support java version hyperloglog
pullRequest.bodyText:
#3319
mainly used for Spark Load process to calculate approximate deduplication value and then serialize to parquet file.
Try to keep the same calculation semantic with be's C++ version
#3433

commit.message:
1 use little endian when serialize to keep same with be
2 add ut logic which keep same logic with be

nodes.bodyText: better to add comment in be/test/olap/hll_test.cpp to notice that the following test case should be consistent with java version in fe/src/test/java/org/apache/doris/load/loadv2/HllTest.java
